Class LeaderModule

java.lang.Object
  navigators.smart.paxosatwar.executionmanager.LeaderModule

public class LeaderModule
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages information about the leader of each round of each consensus

decided

public void decided(int c,
                    int l)
Invoked by the acceptor object when a value is decided It adds a new tuple to the list, which corresponds to the next consensus

Parameters:
c - ID of the consensus established as being decided
l - ID of the replica established as being the leader for the round 0 of the next consensus
